part.name: The Demon
part.info: Farmer Maggot west of Asteria has asked you to investigate the cave he uses to farm mushrooms. According to the farmer, a terribly scary demon has made the cave his home, putting the farmer out of work...

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Ey, and who might you be?! If it's one o' you people from the city again, coming to beg for my shrooms, then scurry away, I told you a dozen times I can't provide any until the cave problem is resolved!

dialog.name: farming
dialog.message: Well not right now I ain't, am I?! Not with the demon lurking around in the cave...

dialog.name: problem
dialog.message: The demon of course! Haven't you heard? He's mighty frightening!

dialog.name: demon
dialog.message: Huh? You must not be from 'round these parts, then. Sorry lad, I thought you was one of them from the city...

See now, one night, a large, fat, figure has been spotted gliding through the shadows, straight into me mushrooms cave! Yes, gliding, as if it had wings! I reckon it must be a demon or a fiend of some sort!

I had tried sending my dogs into the cave, but none of them returned! And I dare not venture into the cave with such evil things lurking around, and so, I cannot gather the mushrooms that I supply Asteria with!

response.message: I could investigate the cave for you.

dialog.name: investigate
dialog.message: Ah, you would?! Well, thank you, stranger! The cave is right by the house, you can't miss it. It even has a warning sign about the demon!
If you find the demon, please slay the beast, so that I can resume my farming business. I still have some coin saved up, so if you succeed, it's yours.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Well? Any luck slaying the demon?

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Well? Any luck slaying the demon?

response.message: Yes, the demon was real and he's dead now.

dialog.name: dead
dialog.message: What?! Of course he was real, I saw him with my bare eyes! Well, I think I saw a shadow...
Anyhow, thank you very much for slaying the beast. Now I can resume my mushroom farming business!
As promised, take this coin as your reward. It's most of my savings, but with the cave clear, I will be able to make more in no time!

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Naia likes mushrooms. Save the mushrooms, {self.gender}.
